property.name: commit.message
property.value: Added RUIAN support. Added ability to modify existing way from Tracer2 plugin

property.name: plugin.author
property.value: Jan Bilak, Petr Dlouhý, Marián Kyral

property.name: plugin.description
property.value: Traces buildings from Czech cadastral map or RUIAN. For parsing cadastral map needs TracerServer (.NET or Mono) to be running.
